title: Login page not working
description: Users are unable to login using their credentials.

title: Error on checkout
description: Checkout process fails with a 500 server error.

title: Profile picture upload failed
description: Users cannot upload profile pictures larger than 2MB.

title: Forgot password email not sent
description: Password reset emails are not being delivered to users.

title: Dashboard loading slow
description: Dashboard takes more than 10 seconds to load.

title: Notifications not showing
description: Real-time notifications are not appearing for users.

title: Search functionality broken
description: Search returns no results even for existing entries.

title: Export PDF fails
description: PDF export of reports fails intermittently.

title: Incorrect totals in reports
description: Financial reports show incorrect totals for last month.

title: Mobile app crashes
description: App crashes when opening settings page on iOS.

title: Settings not saving
description: Changes in user settings are not being saved.

title: Payment gateway timeout
description: Payment API times out intermittently during checkout.

title: Email notifications delayed
description: Some users receive email notifications hours later.

title: File upload fails for large files
description: Uploads above 10MB fail without error message.

title: UI glitch on dashboard
description: Widgets overlap on smaller screens causing layout issues.
